name: Bokdown
description:
Boz the Dog's master has forgotten to lock down the chooks! Sunset is fast approaching and the foxes are hungry. Lock down those chooks before sunset by barking them into their coops!

Made in 3 days for the #TUAGameJam, I decided to live the theme of "lockdown" by using a fantasy console with just 80KB of RAM, a resolution of 240 x 136 (scaled up for your convenience), and simple 4 channel sound. Here's a link to TIC-80 for those interested.

I wanted to create something light-hearted and fun to give us a distraction from the world outside. I hope you enjoy the game! My best score is 79, but I'm sure there are more optimal solutions to the puzzles. Good luck.

I strongly recommend downloading the Windows version for the optimal experience!

Controls ActionKeyboard (QWERTY)Move Up/Down/Left/RightArrow Keys
BarkZReset levelX

Keys can be rebound using the TIC-80 operating system by pressing Esc

ATTRIBUTION

  • Music by Larner, used with permission.
  • All graphics created by me, jf1x, some of which are based on graphics from my other projects.
  • Particle effects library based on code by Viza, freely available on tic80.com and used with permission.
